creator: The Pinkfong Company
descriptionHtml:
Baby Shark World for Kids welcomes all children to a creative world of characters, videos, games, and activities.
The app is safe & ads-free, covering 1,000+ popular Pinkfong Baby Shark videos and 300+ games, all personalized for kids.

About the App:

- Personally curated kids content for each user.
- Play and learn with kids' favorite characters, including Baby Shark, Pinkfong, dinosaurs, and cars.
- Fun and educational topics for kid’s development: Alphabet, Colors, Numbers, Shapes, Healthy habits and more!
- Safe environment with Kids Lock and Ad-free system.
- New videos and games updated daily.

Key Features:

Don't know what to play first? Get a personal recommendation!
- Select your favorite topics, and we'll recommend you activities to play.
- Find out what your kids love in a fast & easy way.
- Explore fun, educational activities on customized [For you] page.

Star your favorite videos & games!
- "Star" your favorite content and replay them whenever you want!
- Star up to 500 content in my 'Favorites' section.
- Come back later to play your favorite videos and games.

Save searching time with your kid’s history
- Go to [Recents] to check what you've played the latest.
- Easily check what your kids' love the best!
- Track your kid’s development milestones.

Join the adventure with YouTube's most-loved character, Pinkfong and Baby Shark!

title: Baby Shark World for Kids

creator: The Pinkfong Company
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to YouTube star, Baby Shark's creative world of fun kids videos, games, songs, and activities!
Baby Shark World for Kids is a safe & entertaining app covering over 1,000 high-quality, professional content for toddlers and children in preschool and kindergarten (2 to 6 years).
Download the app for free and enjoy this marvelous adventure with the shark family, dinosaurs, cars, animals, and more!

Key Features:

1. Explore over 1,000 nursery rhymes & games!
- Choose your favorite character or theme, including Pinkfong, Dinosaurs, ABC, Numbers, Cars, and watch related nursery rhyme videos.
- Discover mini-games featuring these topics: brush T-rex's teeth, feed the monkey, and help the firetruck save the town!
- Learn basic key skills, such as English, numbers, shapes, and colors while you watch and play.
- New videos and games are updated regularly.

2. Star & save your favorite videos & games!
- "Star" your favorite content and come back to replay them whenever you want!
- You can star up to 500 content in my 'Favorites' section.
- Come back later to play your favorite videos and games.
- You can also download videos to watch them offline later.

3. Save searching time with your kid’s history!
- Go to "Recents" to check what your baby has played or watched the latest.
- Easily check what your children love the best!
- Track your kid’s development milestones.

4. Safe environment for babies
- The app contains professionally made, safe, and ads-free content for all kindergartners.
- Use the kids lock feature to prevent children from logging out from the app.
- The app is kids-friendly and does not contain any ads.

Join us on our fun, academic adventure now!
*Baby Shark is now the no. 1 most-viewed video in YouTube with over 10 billion views!
